hero.subtitle: AGENCIA CREATIVA
hero.title: Transformamos marcas con innovación y creatividad.

about.title: somos/
about.paragraph1: Narradores de conceptos en la era digital.
about.paragraph2: Exploramos nuevas tendencias para crear contenido que combina estética, estrategia y tecnología, convertimos ideas en historias que conectan y dejan huella.

aiSection.title: Inteligencia Artificial
aiSection.paragraph: Lo imposible ya se puede crear. Fusionamos tecnología y creatividad humana para dar vida a ideas que antes solo eran un sueño.

realitySection.title: Realidad Aumentada
realitySection.paragraph: Menús 3D para restaurantes: impacta con visualización realista, interacción y una experiencia única.

agencyPage.title: Nuestra agencia /
agencyPage.paragraph1: En un mundo saturado de información, la diferenciación es clave. Una marca no solo se construye con palabras, sino con imágenes que transmiten emociones y videos que cuentan historias. En Agencia Tinta, combinamos creatividad y datos para diseñar producciones que no solo captan la atención, sino que generan impacto y convierten mensajes en experiencias visuales memorables.
agencyPage.paragraph2: Creamos contenido dinámico que fortalece la presencia digital, genera comunidad y convierte audiencias en embajadores de marca. Desde la planificación estratégica hasta la producción audiovisual y fotográfica, potenciamos cada historia con innovación y precisión.
agencyPage.quote: Aquí te presentamos de qué manera lo hacemos.

services.title: Análisis y estrategia
services.description: Definir una estrategia de contenido sólida es clave para construir una marca con identidad, relevancia y conexión genuina con su audiencia, asegurando un impacto duradero en el tiempo.
tags: Desarrollo de contenido y planificación digital

services.title: Redes Sociales
services.description: Creamos comunidades digitales que conectan. Gestionamos tu presencia online con estrategias innovadoras.
tags: Creación de contenido de alto valor

services.title: Identidad visual y diseño
services.description: Convertimos ideas en contenido visual que impacta, combinando diseño, creatividad y narrativa para crear piezas que conectan con las audiencias en cualquier formato, ya sea en entornos digitales o físicos.
tags: Diseño de identidad visual y verbal
Diseño de experiencias digitales y físicas
Creación de materiales gráficos y multimedia

services.title: Web y performance marketing
services.description: Optimizamos tu presencia digital para generar impacto y conversiones. Desde el diseño web hasta campañas de alto rendimiento.
tags: Diseño y desarrollo web, microsites y landing pages
User Experience (UX) y optimización de interfaces

services.title: Producción audiovisual
services.description: Damos forma a tu marca a través de contenido visual que cautiva y conecta. Nos encargamos de la dirección creativa, producción y edición para crear piezas audiovisuales que dejan huella.
tags: IA aplicada a producción de video y contenido digital

contactPage.title: Contacta con nosotros
contactPage.subtitle: Estamos para escucharte y acompañarte con las ideas que tengas para tu marca, tu negocio o para contribuir a transformar el mundo.

form.name: Nombre Completo*
form.successMessage: Gracias por tu mensaje. Te responderemos lo antes posible.
form.errorMessage: Algo salió mal. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo.

legalPage.title: Legal Notice
legalPage.subtitle: In compliance with Law 34/2002, of July 11, on Information Society Services and Electronic Commerce (LSSI-CE), the user is informed of the following:

identificationData.title: 1. Identification data
items: Business name: Agencia Tinta
Contact email: agenciadigitaltinta@gmail.com
Activity: Marketing, design and content production agency
Location: Spain
Website: www.agenciatinta.com

websiteObjective.title: 2. Website purpose
websiteObjective.content:
This website aims to provide information about Agencia Tinta's services and projects, as well as facilitate communication with potential clients and collaborators.

By accessing and using this website, the user accepts the conditions established in this Legal Notice. It is recommended to read it carefully before continuing browsing.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual and industrial property
intellectualProperty.content:
All website content, including (for illustrative and non-limiting purposes) source code, texts, images, logos, graphic designs and multimedia elements, are the exclusive property of Agencia Tinta or third parties who have authorized their use, and are protected by Spanish and international legislation on intellectual and industrial property.

Their reproduction, distribution, public communication, transformation or any other unauthorized use, total or partial, is prohibited without the prior written consent of Agencia Tinta.

webUsageAndResponsibility.title: 4. Website usage and responsibility
webUsageAndResponsibility.intro:
The user commits to use the website lawfully and in accordance with current legislation, refraining from performing any action that may damage the image, interests or rights of Agencia Tinta or third parties.

Agencia Tinta is not responsible for:
items: Improper use that users make of the website content.
Information or content linked from external pages.
Possible technical or security errors arising from the use of inadequate equipment or connections by the user.

informationUpdate.title: 5. Information update
informationUpdate.content: Agencia Tinta may modify, without prior notice, the website content, its design or this legal information, with the aim of keeping it updated. Likewise, it commits to correct any detected error as soon as it becomes aware of it.

commercialCommunications.title: 6. Commercial communications
commercialCommunications.content:
Agencia Tinta complies with the provisions of the LSSI-CE regarding commercial communications.

All information sent to clients with the purpose of maintaining the existing contractual relationship or responding to prior information requests will not be considered commercial communication.

cookiesUsage.title: 7. Use of cookies
cookiesUsage.content: This website uses cookies to improve user experience and collect statistical data anonymously. For more information, check our Cookie Policy.

applicableLegislation.title: 8. Applicable legislation and jurisdiction
applicableLegislation.content: This Legal Notice is governed by Spanish legislation. Any controversy that may arise from access or use of the website will be submitted to the courts of the city where Agencia Tinta has its headquarters, unless the law provides otherwise.

cookiesPage.title: 🍪 Agencia Tinta Cookie Policy
cookiesPage.subtitle: At Agencia Tinta we use cookies. And no, we're not talking about the chocolate ones (although we love those too), but those small digital files that make your experience on our website more fluid, fast and personalized.
cookiesPage.description: We want you to know exactly what they are, what they're for and how you can control them. Here we go 👇

what.title: 1. What are cookies?
what.content: They are small files that your browser stores on your device when you visit our website.

benefits.title: They help us to:
items: Remember your preferences (language, settings, etc.).
Understand how you use our site so we can improve it.
Show you content that really interests you.

what.security: Don't worry: they don't harm your equipment and don't store sensitive personal data like passwords or card numbers.

byOwner.title: By who manages them:
items: First-party: created and managed by us.
Third-party: created by external services (e.g. Google Analytics, social networks).

byDuration.title: By how long they last:
items: Session: deleted when you close your browser.
Persistent: stay until you delete them or they expire on their own.

byPurpose.title: By their purpose:
items: Technical: make the website work (without them, nothing would be the same).
Personalization: remember your settings and preferences.
Analytics: give us statistics to keep improving.
Advertising: manage the ads you see.
Behavioral advertising: show ads tailored to your interests.

technical.title: Technical cookies (necessary)
technical.content: They allow the basic functioning of the site. They do not require consent.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.content: Google Analytics: helps us understand how users navigate the site.

advertising.title: Advertising cookies
advertising.content: Meta Pixel (Facebook/Instagram): allows us to show you relevant ads on social networks.

manage.title: 4. How to control or delete cookies
manage.content: You're in control. You can allow, block or delete cookies from your browser settings:

consent.title: 5. Consent and data protection
consent.content:
By continuing to browse our website you accept the use of these cookies, unless you decide to deactivate them.

At Agencia Tinta we don't use cookies to spy on you or sell your information. We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679 and the LSSI-CE.

If you want to know more about how we take care of your privacy, you can read our Privacy Policy.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.subtitle:
At Agencia Tinta we take your privacy and the protection of your personal data very seriously.
In compliance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 (GDPR), Organic Law 3/2018, of 5 December, on the Protection of Personal Data and Guarantee of Digital Rights (LOPDGDD) and Law 34/2002, of 11 July, on Information Society Services and Electronic Commerce (LSSI-CE), we inform you of the following:

responsible.title: 1. Data controller
items: Business name: Agencia Tinta
Contact email: agenciadigitaltinta@gmail.com
Activity: Marketing, design and content production agency
Location: Spain

dataCollected.title: 2. Data we collect
dataCollected.intro: We may collect the following information through forms, website interactions or analytics tools:
items: Name
Email address
IP address
Browsing information (through cookies; see our Cookie Policy)

purpose.title: 3. Purpose of processing
items: Respond to inquiries or requests received.
Improve user experience and analyze browsing behavior.
Send commercial communications related to our services, provided that you have given your express consent.

legitimacy.title: 4. Legal basis
legitimacy.intro: The legal basis for processing your data is:
items: Your express consent when sending us a form or accepting the use of cookies.
The execution of pre-contractual or contractual measures, when applicable.

recipients.title: 5. Data recipients
recipients.intro: We may use third-party services that process data on our behalf, such as:
items: Google LLC (Google Analytics)
Meta Platforms, Inc. (Facebook Pixel)
Netlify, Inc. (website hosting)
Resend, Inc. (sending emails from forms)
recipients.additional: In any case, these providers comply with data protection regulations and, when necessary, have signed data processing agreements.

internationalTransfers.title: 6. International transfers
internationalTransfers.content: In the event that any of the indicated services involves an international data transfer (for example, providers with servers outside the EU), we will ensure that it is carried out with the appropriate legal safeguards, either through Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission or equivalent mechanisms.

retention.title: 7. Data retention
retention.content: Your data will be retained only for the time necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected and to address possible legal responsibilities arising from the processing.

userRights.title: 8. User rights
userRights.intro: You can exercise your rights at any time:
items: Access: know if we process your data and obtain a copy of it.
Rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
Erasure (right to be forgotten): request the deletion of your data when it is no longer necessary.
Opposition: prevent us from processing your data in certain cases.
Restriction of processing: temporarily restrict the use of your data.
Portability: receive your data in electronic format and transmit it to another controller.

exercisingRights.title: 9. Exercising rights
exercisingRights.content: To exercise your rights, you can send us an email to agenciadigitaltinta@gmail.com indicating the right you wish to exercise and attaching a copy of your identity document.

complaints.title: 10. Complaints to the Supervisory Authority
complaints.intro: If you consider that your rights have not been respected, you can file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD):
items: Address: C/ Jorge Juan, 6, 28001 Madrid
Website: https://sedeagpd.gob.es

policyChanges.title: 11. Policy changes
policyChanges.content: Agencia Tinta reserves the right to modify this policy to adapt it to legislative or technical changes. Any modification will be published on this same page.

hero.name: Foodar
hero.title: Transforma tu carta con realidad aumentada
hero.subtitle: El futuro de los menús ya está aquí. Muestra tus platos como nunca antes

cards.title: Cada comensal escanea el código QR en la mesa
Visualiza cada plato en 3D con proporciones y texturas reales.
Elige con confianza viendo cada detalle del plato
cards.imageAlt: Plato de comida en la mesa

cards.title: Cada bocado es exactamente como lo imaginó
cards.imageAlt: Mujer joven disfrutando de la comida

features.title: Mejor experiencia de usuario
features.description: La interacción con el menú 3D genera un impacto positivo en la percepción del cliente, haciéndolo más memorable y atractivo.

features.title: Optimización de carta y aumento de ticket medio
features.description: Con el análisis de estadísticas, el restaurante puede identificar qué platos generan más interés y ajustar su oferta en consecuencia.

features.title: Menos indecisión, más rotación de mesas
features.description: Al visualizar los platos de forma realista, los clientes deciden más rápido, reduciendo los tiempos de espera y aumentando la rotación de mesas.

features.title: Diferenciación competitiva
features.description: Ofrecer una experiencia innovadora con realidad aumentada posiciona al restaurante como un referente tecnológico y vanguardista en la industria.
